Html:
I'm creating a sheet with some text formatted with borders and colors and saved with PHPExcelWriterExcel5 1.6.0
When I copy those cells fromthe written file, into another excell 2003 sheet, the borders and text colors dont'match.
In the file 'Color.php' the indexed color map has the first 8 elements repeated twice.... is it correct?

This is correct behaiour.
About the colors: we tried to map most of the colors to Excel 5, but this is not correct for all of them.
